mng: (arch.) minister, official, noun prefix denoting function or status, a youth

exm.mng: Dolan, a people of the Tarim Basin, Xinjiang, also known as 多郎
doctor (Chinese medicine), ancient official title, companions (respectful)
Cowherd and Weaving maid (characters in folk story), separated lovers, Altair and Vega (stars)
Ishihara Jintarō (1932-), Japanese author and politician, governor of Tokyo since 1999
